item.title: How Flannery O’Connor Made Me Fall in Love with Southern Fiction
item.dc:creator: Emily Gatlin
item.description:

item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
As for the slowing of the growth in ebooks, I would note that according to the latest numbers the yearly gain in ebook share is “only” 20.7 percent, while the overall market for publishers’ books is down. Adult hardcovers are down 21.5 percent. item.title: Some Books Are Better Than Others
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Anyone who reads knows that some books are better than others. You can feel it. Some books excite and edify. Others are impossible to get through.
